channel.title: Open source HybridScape
channel.description:
For a little while I've been playing with older sources & I remembered [b]HybridScape[/b] from a few years ago that came with [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,6915.0.html]Moparscape 3.2[/url] and found that as I briefly remember it's closed source. I tried using several decompilers but it seems there are some errors.[quote]MISSING MONITORENTER' means that jad found a MONITOREXIT instruction while there was no MONITORENTER to pair up with it. a monitor is a 'lock', used in synchronized () { } blocks to support synchronous code constructs.
edit: bahahahah couldnt help but lol:
[code]/* Woodawg23's perfect decompiler * Coming soon to rune-server */[/code]
some idiot nmed woodawg23 used JAD and pretends to have used a custom decompiler ahahah.
anyway the errors in this server are of a more broad scope, for example like ReTT$ReTask.java, which has a class definition the same a ReTT.ReTask causing javac to freak out[/QUOTE]But moparisthebest said that it's open source in the thread, so I tried downloading another mirror from megaupload and that didn't allow the player(s) to log in there was some exception.[quote="moparisthebest"][quote author=dlong link=topic=6915.msg71131#msg71131 date=1153235491]hey how do you edit your game when u got it?? plz tell me becuz i got it.... But theres like not any monsters tell me how to plz!![/quote]check they hybridscape folder, its opensource[/quote] Does someone have the .java files to this specific copy of hybridscape?

item.title: Open source HybridScape
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

No problem, it’s not as easy to get to as I would like. But just about everything I use is open-source, so there was no harm in asking.

Read full topic

item.title: Open source HybridScape
item.dc:creator: @WW1 WW
item.description:
@WW1 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:2, topic:418036”]You didn’t look here did you?

http://cache.hybridscape.com/MoparScapeSources.jar[/quote]I actually did download that file but I looked in client317_src.jar not server317_src.jar, I feel like an idiot - but a happy idiot. Thank you, surprised I got a reply to be honest (and so quick).

Read full topic

item.title: Open source HybridScape
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

You didn’t look here did you?

http://cache.hybridscape.com/MoparScapeSources.jar

Read full topic

item.title: Open source HybridScape
item.dc:creator: @WW1 WW
item.description:
@WW1 wrote:

For a little while I’ve been playing with older sources & I remembered HybridScape from a few years ago that came with Moparscape 3.2 and found that as I briefly remember it’s closed source. I tried using several decompilers but it seems there are some errors.[quote]MISSING MONITORENTER’ means that jad found a MONITOREXIT instruction while there was no MONITORENTER to pair up with it. a monitor is a ‘lock’, used in synchronized () { } blocks to support synchronous code constructs.

edit: bahahahah couldnt help but lol:

[code]/* Woodawg23’s perfect decompiler

  • Coming soon to rune-server
    */[/code]

some idiot nmed woodawg23 used JAD and pretends to have used a custom decompiler ahahah.

anyway the errors in this server are of a more broad scope, for example like ReTT$ReTask.java, which has a class definition the same a ReTT.ReTask causing javac to freak out[/QUOTE]But moparisthebest said that it’s open source in the thread, so I tried downloading another mirror from megaupload and that didn’t allow the player(s) to log in there was some exception.[quote=“moparisthebest”][quote author=dlong link=topic=6915.msg71131#msg71131 date=1153235491]hey how do you edit your game when u got it?? plz tell me becuz i got it… But theres like not any monsters tell me how to plz!![/quote]check they hybridscape folder, its opensource[/quote]
Does someone have the .java files to this specific copy of hybridscape?
